short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple serial monitor, similar to the one included in the Arduino IDE

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send and receive data through a serial connection, intentionally similar to the Serial Monitor tool included in the Arduino IDE.

Changelog:

1.1 
- (new) COM ports sorted alphabetically
- (new) selection of baud rate
- (bugfix) removed wrong action on selectmenu

1.0 
- Initial release
